channel.title: Projects list on Rapid Control Prototyping (RCP)
channel.description: Recent content in Projects list on Rapid Control Prototyping (RCP)

item.title: Auto-pilote for Plane based on Simulink
item.description: Model based design for an RC plane autopilot

item.title: Inverted Pendulum
item.description: Inverted pendulum running on a microstick II dsPIC board. An IMU algorithm estimate the angle based on a MEMS inertial sensor. LQR feedback controls the DC motors of the trolley. No encoder are used.

item.title: Real Time Control for a DC Motor
item.description: Simulation & real-time control of a Pravalux 24v DC motor (INSA Lyon hands-on)
